TopicTitle: Which universe are you playing in?

Articles.Content:
Did I miss any?

Edited February 18, 2014 by Vanamonde

Hmm? Roleplaying at least, I'm playing in the Milky Way a few hundred years from now. And I'm assuming the Kerbals are normal humans lol.

EDIT: I see the poll now. Stock for the time being.

Edited February 18, 2014 by RSwordsman
I've never been to Moho or Eeloo or most of Jool's moons, so I've got a lot to go through before considering any other systems.
What's Alternis, Boris or Urania??? I'm playing mostly with RSS at the moment

....The real one?

On a Moar Serious NoteÃ¢â€žÂ¢, I'm playing a bit of career ATM. I had a Dres mission that was attacked by Kraken on ship toggle by the means of []. It ended up with me looking at a single flat 2.5m-1.25m adapter near Kerbin that was accelerating into space at 4G. And I couldn't leave so I had to taskmanage KSP to sudden death. When I loaded it up again, my dres mission (that was in a low Dres orbit) was in LKO. :/

EDIT: Oh, OP was talking about solar systems, not universes.The difference is, solar systems are the planet packs and universes are saves.

Edited February 18, 2014 by KvickFlygarn87
RSS 10x scale. So just the stock system with 10 times the normal size.
Dammit I forgot to vote "other" instead of stock, cause RSS.
I use The sentar expansion pack I'm my carrer ATM, I would use alternis and Urania as well but it uses up too much memory, maybe next update I'll go with MOAR planets rather then KAS/kethane ect.
Interesting...Never heard of any of the other ones. Only stock sounded familiar, probably because of the fact that you'd always have a stock one...

Where's Kerbal Universe?

Verviedi, Verion, Poltuara, and Manai.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67147-0-23-The-Kerbal-Universe-Project-GP2-Release%21/page7

You missed a lot.
I voted "other" because I switch between them so much.
I'm playing with Sentar expansion and Urania system pack, used to have Verviedi system pack (aka Abaddon) installed, but my laptop crashes (no its not just KSP)

I'm playing with Sentar expansion and Urania system pack, used to have Verviedi system pack (aka Abaddon) installed, but my laptop crashes (no its not just KSP)

I think I remember you from IC2 forum. I was enderwraithguard.

On a related note: I don't blame you. Abaddon takes up a lottttt of memory.
Not sure... My 6D space-time widget was struck by a falling donut, and I'm having a hard time finding spare parts.
Stock at the moment. I am trying to install super Eve but nothing is working
Stock but I have Krag's Planet Factory CE installed and a custom star system, however I currently am leaving them disabled.
